fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Storm a player's house during the night. 3 Uses
- Determine if a player is kill-capable during the day. 2 Uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you storm a player's house during the night, you will check if they have a kill-capable ability. If they do, you will attack them, and roleblock them past immunity.
- Any player capable of performing a factional kill will come up as kill-capable when you check them, along with normal kill-capable roles.
